com.docker.domain.game

Class LoadRating

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.docker.domain.game.LoadRating

  • public class LoadRating
extends java.lang.Object
    Load rating which calculates the load balance and score of the game
    Author:
    it-monkey

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoadRating

        public LoadRating(float breakValue,
          float capsizeValue,
          float handicapFactor)
        Constructor for the Loadrating class
        Parameters:
        breakValue - Value when the ship will break 0 might be to low, use 5 or 6
        capsizeValue - Value when the ship will capsize 0 might be to low, use 7 or 8
        handicapFactor - Value which multiplies the score with a specific factor

    • Method Detail

      • calculate

        public void calculate(float[][] loadTable)
        Calculates the load rating from a given loadTable and writes the calculated values into the breakValue, capsizeValue, and beautyValue
        Parameters:
        loadTable - two dimensional array of the weight on each position of the ship
